Posts.Title: I never wanted to post here, but what do I do now?? AlaskaDeb heatherpalmerton

Posts.Content: Dec 3, 2007 08:16PM Barb1953 wrote: Hi Lisa, My first bout with LE was 4 yrs ago. It started while I was scraping wallpaper. The next day, I had no knuckles !! I had'nt even heard of LE. My radiation onc sent me to therapy.I had masssage therapy everyday for one week. They taught me how to wrap my arm,which I did everynight for a few months. I also wear a sleeve& gauntlet ---every day at first, but now I only wear it when doing anything strenuous, likeyard work. It does seem worse in the hot weather. I can usually tell when I need to put my sleeve on, my are feels real heavy. So far mine is pretty much under controll. Good Luck to you.
